targets.rawSql: SELECT SrcSite, DstSite, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes, count() as flow_count FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) GROUP BY SrcSite, DstSite ORDER BY total_bytes DESC
SELECT SrcAS, DstAS, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes, count() as flow_count FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) GROUP BY SrcAS, DstAS ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 50
SELECT SrcSite, DstSite, Proto, sum(Bytes) as total_bytes FROM helios_flows.flows_enriched WHERE $__timeFilter(TimeReceived) GROUP BY SrcSite, DstSite, Proto ORDER BY total_bytes DESC LIMIT 50
